channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Teacher who was shot by 6-year-old student at school testifies she thought she had died
item.description: A former Virginia teacher who was shot by a 6-year-old student in 2023 says she thought she died that day.

item.title: Storm reveals artifacts preserved in Quinhagak permafrost
How Americans feel about changing the clocks, according to a new AP-NORC poll
